ModMetaData.name: EmbrasuresUpdated
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa, Bia10
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 2.1.0.1 - Updated for 1.4
Adds embrasures for that can be shot through, while blocking passage, giving your colonists an advantage in combat. Enemies will still be able to fire back but your troops will be in cover similar to sandbags and can’t be rushed by melee forces. The holes in the wall allow temperature to equalize through the gaps.
Setting have been added to allow you to customise the cost and protection given.
Original mod by: Jaxxa - https://github.com/jaxxa/JaxxaRimworldReleaseCollection/blob/master/README.md Art by: Syrchalis Korean translation by Steam user "Coldmoon" ChineseSimplified Translation by Github user "WishingLaws"
